接口 MonitorInterface

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.rmi.Remote
    所有已知实现类:
    RiskGameMonitor

    public interface MonitorInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The interface for the monitor interface

    • 方法详细资料

      • updatePhaseView

        void updatePhaseView(java.util.Observable arg0,
                     int current,
                     int type)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        interface definition of update phaseView
        参数:
        arg0 - the variable observer from observable class
        current - the number of current game
        type - the game type
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Remote Exceptions

      • updatePhaseView

        void updatePhaseView(java.lang.String info,
                     java.awt.Color color,
                     int type)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        interface definition of update phaseView
        参数:
        info - the information of phase need to update
        color - the color of the phase
        type - the type number of the phase
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Remote Exceptions

      • updateLogWindow

        void updateLogWindow(java.lang.String newLog)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        interface definition of update LogWindow
        参数:
        newLog - the log window of the update information
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Remote Exceptions

      • updateDomiView

        void updateDomiView(int num,
                    int[] size,
                    java.awt.Color[] colors)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        interface definition of update DomiView
        参数:
        num - the number of the domination view
        size - the size of the domination view
        colors - the color the domination view
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Remote Exceptions

      • updateCardsView

        boolean updateCardsView(java.lang.String info1,
                        java.lang.String info2,
                        java.lang.String info3,
                        java.lang.String info4,
                        int type)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        interface definition of update CardsView
        参数:
        info1 - the information of card 1
        info2 - the information of card 2
        info3 - the information of card 3
        info4 - the information of card 4
        type - the number of type
        返回:
        whether it success or not
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Remote Exceptions
